{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4286857,"totalDownVotes":786174,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":77889,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":543828,"totalDownVotes":38148,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":13440,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":644151,"totalDownVotes":48745,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":25932,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1207654,"totalDownVotes":130695,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":97066,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1032944,"totalDownVotes":52148,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":10660,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3825147,"totalDownVotes":315549,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":23893,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Você pode resolver o mistério e sobreviver a cada rodada?

"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":915232,"totalDownVotes":119140,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀SUPER LUCK🍀] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":6282,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Super Luck Event!

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1199364,"totalDownVotes":68270,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":8209,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":319552,"totalDownVotes":33180,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":5762,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW STAND UPDATE』 🏹✨

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1446525,"totalDownVotes":120798,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":14153,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Construa o seu barco e navegue em uma aventura em curso ao tesouro!

"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4381227,"totalDownVotes":593137,"universeId":245662005,"name":"👮‍♀️ UPDATE! Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":7545,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"탈옥수와 경찰에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 경찰이나 도둑의 삶을 살게 됩니다. 범죄를 멈추거나 저지르는 거죠. 법을 수호하거나 법을 어기거나. 이 세계에서 선택은 여러분의 몫입니다. 

최근 업데이트... 
💰 네 개의 은행! 강도 사건마다 임의로 선택됨! 
💎 새로워진 보석 상점! 
💎 보석 상점 총 6층! 강도 사건마다 임의로 세 개의 층이 선택됨! 
💰 주유소와 도넛 가게 강도로 세 배의 캐시를 획득! 
🎮 [VIP 서버] 플레이어 수가 충분할 시 강도 대기 시간 단축! 

섬네일: @ID0ntHaveAUse와 Roblox! 

아래의 SNS 링크를 팔로우하여 업데이트 소식을 미리 받아보세요!"},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":30025,"totalDownVotes":6600,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":5421,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- New code system
- New x2 XP/Yen/Strength boosts
- Added a confirmation for spinning when you have a legendary class
- Rebirths now increase spin luck 
- Added a buy all spins button
- Added another tyrone dummy npc to test critical damage
- Added 3 songs
- Scanner gamepass now abbreviates stats 

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3259957,"totalDownVotes":287333,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":10140,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":1235888,"creatorName":"The MLG Gang","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":40620,"totalDownVotes":2714,"universeId":2492481398,"name":"Noob Army Tycoon","placeId":6610021055,"playerCount":11225,"imageToken":"T_6610021055_7d68","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Attack the other noobs in this epic tycoon."},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":709586,"totalDownVotes":95419,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":4604,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island

🐔 Raise animals

🔥 And more!

Controls:

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2175310,"totalDownVotes":667361,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":19129,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":241954,"totalDownVotes":21494,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":9583,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100
There are 30 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":462087,"totalDownVotes":44789,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[FL] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":5451,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE
🎮 Console - D-PAD or XYBA

[CREDIT TO THE ORIGINAL FNF GAME]

https://devforum.roblox.com/t/ff-credits-and-information

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":156606,"totalDownVotes":8389,"universeId":648454481,"name":"🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":2399,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":3732983,"creatorName":"polandgamebuilders","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":71186,"totalDownVotes":13962,"universeId":943733974,"name":"🎉 Week II 🎉   Bitcoin Miner [Beta]","placeId":2629642516,"playerCount":2597,"imageToken":"T_2629642516_7060","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Bitcoin Miner, in this game you can mine bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, upgrade new cards, buy new mining devices and many other.


🚧Game still under construction so expect new Updates soon.


💡New game updates coming soon!
- ❗ Quest Sytem Rework!
- 💱 Exchanger revamp!



📕update log 📕
- 🎉 Bit Event 2!
- 🖥️ New Change Card Ui!
- 🌿 New Decorations
- Unloading plots
- Fast Card Placement
- 🔊 Some Sound effects!
- ⚙️ Bug Fixes!


⚠️Note: This is just a simulation, all cryptocurrencies are ONLY in-game items, NOT connected to real world ones

⬇️ Check Social links for new Update info

Ps. Sorry but we won't add Dogecoin to this game. We always try to do what players want but adding Dogecoin is impossible for many reasons."},{"creatorId":28603491,"creatorName":"SushiWalrus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":558527,"totalDownVotes":57515,"universeId":380704901,"name":"[Zone Control! (KoTH)] Ro-Ghoul [ALPHA]","placeId":914010731,"playerCount":2158,"imageToken":"T_914010731_9b0a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you everyone for supporting me and my game (:

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE
Check out the social links down below the description! And follow the game while you're at it c:

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.
X = Toggle sprint.
Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:

Still in heavy development.

Please do not try to ruin the game for other players as we have our own moderation system and may temporarily ban you or in worse cases, permanently.

Accessories aside from hair gets removed."},{"creatorId":6116651,"creatorName":"Crafty Savage!","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":40613,"totalDownVotes":3610,"universeId":1700723639,"name":"[👑10MIL EVENT!] Combat Rift","placeId":4952780297,"playerCount":3133,"imageToken":"T_4952780297_c4c8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Combat Rift! 

👑10M EVENT!
✨2X GLOBAL XP BOOST(ENTIRE EVENT)
🥚10M Secret Eggs hidden across all maps, can you find all the pets? (Each egg rewards a different/better pet)
🐾6 New 10M Pets found in 10M secret eggs!
🔮7 HIDDEN CODES across all maps!
🐛 Bug Fixes(Fixed Dual Wield(x2 Damage))
😨 SOMETHING COMING SOON(???)

The event will end in the next update!

How to Play:
👹 Battle monsters!
💎 Discover Rare Swords!
💰 Sell skulls to get coins from the chest!
☠️ Reach Max level!
🥇 Climb The Leaderboards!
👑 Discover New Worlds!
🐾 Hatch Pets with gems from Killing Monsters!

⭐ Favorite, Follow, and Like the game to show support! ⭐
Use Codes: "NinjaCaves"

⚜️ Join the Group: "Crafty Savage" for Group chest and Tag! ⚜️
🐦 Follow @LordWasteds on Twitter for news! 🐦
🔔 Hit the follow button to be notified of updates first! 🔔
Thank you! 
(SHUTDOWN = UPDATE/FIXES)"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":280845,"totalDownVotes":146445,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":3010,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":668190,"totalDownVotes":129465,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":1322,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!

Welcome to Southwest Florida! Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
